name: Dark Night: Shoot Aliens
description:
One cold winter night the world is invaded by an alien race. Luckily Alan has found refuge in a building and will have to fight and resist to protect his position!!!

You will be challenged in dozens of levels, protecting your posts spread across the building area.

An arsenal of weapons will be at your disposal to repel the hordes of Aliens and continue the game, level after level you will have to clean the whole building from the terrible Aliens!

-Fight the enemy even with powerful laser weapons from the future!

-Unlock all the arsenal at your disposal!

-Increase the power level of your firearms!

-Increase the level of protection of your defense!

-Increase the level of your health!

-There are different races of aliens and they are getting stronger!

-Kill all the aliens you meet on your way!

-Collect treasure, then buy weapons and more!

-Choose how best to use the weapons at your disposal!

-Buy ammo and explosives in bulk!

-Unlock defense turrets to wipe out the aliens!

The game is under development and will be updated to the full version soon!

Recommended device features:

-Android 8 or later (Android 13 not supported yet!)

-Adreno 600 or higher

-Mali-T800 or higher

- Minimum 2GB of RAM

- Minimum 1Gb storage space

GPU (Imagination Tech PowerVR) Not supported. It can slow down.

Mediatek CPU not compatible.
